citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1215 on
28-JAN-20.
Upon arrival at the facility I knocked on the front door and rang the doorbell. I also honked my horn. I then waited
at the end of the driveway for thirty minutes.
End of report.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1215 on
28-JAN-20.
Upon arrival at the facility I knocked on the front door and rang the doorbell.  I also honked my horn.  I then waited
at the end of the driveway for thirty minutes.  
End of report.
